attributes.action: treat everyone equally when providing working tax credits, it should not matter how much you earn as it seems to be the more tax you pay the less you get back in return.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who have worked from the bottom to the middle or even the top are being penalised. Our tax money is going to others so their standard of living can be brought to the same standard as us without having to climb up the career ladder. The government send out a bad signal in relation to receiving working tax credits as it seems to be the more you earn the less you get back. For example someone who works full time with a good wage receives approx £10 per week and someone who works 16 hours a week on minimum wage receives approx £150 per week. What is the point of working more hours and making more money when others just get it handed to them freely? I am sick of paying for other peoples luxuries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
